scripts.dispatcher: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy financial-news-dispatcher --entry-point dispatchFinancialNewsProcessing --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-topic financial-news-dispatching
scripts.rss-processor: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy news-rss-processor --entry-point processNewsRSS --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-topic financial-news-processing
scripts.rss-http: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy news-rss-http --entry-point retrieve --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy: npm run dispatcher && npm run rss-processor && npm run rss-http
